content.json:
# üöÄ AI Resume Advisor API Monitoring Dashboard

---

### Real-time monitoring for Azure FastAPI application

Last updated: {TimeRange:label}

content.query:
requests
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where url contains "api"
| summarize 
    TotalRequests = count(),
    SuccessRequests = countif(success == true),
    FailedRequests = countif(success == false),
    AvgDuration = round(avg(duration), 2),
    P95Duration = round(percentile(duration, 95), 2)
| extend SuccessRate = round(100.0 * SuccessRequests / TotalRequests, 2)
| project 
    ['üìä Total Requests'] = TotalRequests,
    ['‚úÖ Success Rate'] = strcat(SuccessRate, '%'),
    ['‚ùå Failed Requests'] = FailedRequests,
    ['‚è±Ô∏è Avg Duration'] = strcat(AvgDuration, ' ms'),
    ['üìà P95 Duration'] = strcat(P95Duration, ' ms')
content.title: API Performance KPIs

content.query:
requests
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where url contains "api"
| summarize 
    Requests = count(),
    AvgDuration = avg(duration),
    Errors = countif(success == false)
    by bin(timestamp, 5m)
| project 
    timestamp,
    ['Requests'] = Requests,
    ['Avg Duration (ms)'] = round(AvgDuration, 2),
    ['Errors'] = Errors
| render timechart
content.title: Request Trends

content.query:
requests
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where url contains "api" and success == true
| extend ResponseTimeBucket = case(
    duration <= 100, "0-100ms",
    duration <= 500, "100-500ms", 
    duration <= 1000, "500ms-1s",
    duration <= 2000, "1-2s",
    duration <= 5000, "2-5s",
    ">5s")
| summarize Count = count() by ResponseTimeBucket
| sort by ResponseTimeBucket
content.title: Response Time Distribution

content.query:
requests
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where url contains "api"
| extend endpoint = tostring(split(parse_url(url).Path, "?")[0])
| summarize 
    RequestCount = count(),
    AvgDuration = round(avg(duration), 2),
    P95Duration = round(percentile(duration, 95), 2),
    ErrorRate = round(countif(success == false) * 100.0 / count(), 2),
    Errors = countif(success == false)
    by endpoint
| project 
    Endpoint = endpoint,
    ['Total Requests'] = RequestCount,
    ['Avg Duration (ms)'] = AvgDuration,
    ['P95 Duration (ms)'] = P95Duration,
    ['Error Rate (%)'] = ErrorRate,
    ['Error Count'] = Errors
| order by ['Total Requests'] desc
content.title: Endpoint Performance Analysis

content.query:
requests
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where success == false
| extend endpoint = tostring(split(parse_url(url).Path, "?")[0])
| summarize ErrorCount = count() by endpoint, resultCode
| order by ErrorCount desc
| take 10
content.title: Top Errors

content.query:
requests
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where url contains "extract-jd-keywords"
| extend 
    endpoint = tostring(split(parse_url(url).Path, "?")[0]),
    hasError = iff(success == false, 1, 0)
| summarize 
    TotalRequests = count(),
    Errors = sum(hasError),
    AvgDuration = avg(duration),
    P95Duration = percentile(duration, 95)
    by bin(timestamp, 15m)
| project 
    timestamp,
    ['Keyword Extractions'] = TotalRequests,
    ['Avg Duration (ms)'] = round(AvgDuration, 2),
    ['Errors'] = Errors
| render timechart
content.title: Keyword Extraction Performance

content.query:
traces
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where message contains "RequestTracked" or message contains "RequestStarted" or message contains "security" or message contains "blocked"
| extend 
    EventType = case(
        message contains "RequestTracked", "Request Tracked",
        message contains "RequestStarted", "Request Started",
        message contains "blocked", "Security Blocked",
        message contains "security", "Security Event",
        "Other"
    )
| summarize Count = count() by EventType
| render piechart
content.title: Monitoring Events Distribution

content.query:
dependencies
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name contains "openai" or type == "HTTP"
| summarize 
    CallCount = count(),
    AvgDuration = avg(duration),
    FailureCount = countif(success == false),
    FailureRate = round(countif(success == false) * 100.0 / count(), 2)
    by name, type
| project 
    ['Dependency'] = name,
    ['Type'] = type,
    ['Total Calls'] = CallCount,
    ['Avg Duration (ms)'] = round(AvgDuration, 2),
    ['Failures'] = FailureCount,
    ['Failure Rate (%)'] = FailureRate
| order by ['Total Calls'] desc
content.title: External Dependencies

content.query:
// Health Status Check
let recentRequests = requests
| where timestamp > ago(5m)
| where url contains "api"
| summarize 
    LastRequest = max(timestamp),
    RecentRequests = count(),
    RecentErrors = countif(success == false);
let healthStatus = recentRequests
| extend 
    MinutesSinceLastRequest = datetime_diff('minute', now(), LastRequest),
    ErrorRate = iff(RecentRequests > 0, round(RecentErrors * 100.0 / RecentRequests, 2), 0.0),
    Status = case(
        MinutesSinceLastRequest > 5, "‚ö†Ô∏è No Recent Activity",
        ErrorRate > 10, "‚ùå High Error Rate",
        ErrorRate > 5, "‚ö†Ô∏è Warning",
        "‚úÖ Healthy"
    )
| project 
    ['Status'] = Status,
    ['Last Request'] = strcat(MinutesSinceLastRequest, ' minutes ago'),
    ['Recent Requests (5m)'] = RecentRequests,
    ['Error Rate'] = strcat(ErrorRate, '%');
healthStatus
content.title: System Health Status
